hero.name: Bulşah Keçici
hero.title: Data Scientist & Computer Engineer
hero.subtitle: Building intelligent systems and data-driven solutions

about.title: About Me
about.bio: I'm Bulşah Keçici, a Data Scientist and Computer Engineer based in Ankara, Turkey, with over 9 years of experience in developing AI-driven analytical and automation systems. I specialize in transforming complex data into actionable insights through machine learning, computer vision, and intelligent process automation. My background combines statistical expertise and full-stack development, allowing me to design end-to-end AI solutions — from data processing pipelines to production-ready deployment. My work focuses on real-world problem-solving across infrastructure analytics, automation, and decision-support systems. I bridge the gap between research and implementation, using Python, SQL, and modern DevOps tools (Docker, Kubernetes, Git) to deliver scalable, measurable results. Passionate about innovation and cross-border collaboration, I'm open to opportunities in Germany and across Europe to build intelligent systems that shape the future of data-driven decision making.

highlights.title: Career Highlights
items: 9+ years of experience in data science and software engineering
Expertise in Python, Machine Learning, and Full-Stack Development

about.availability: Open to relocation and collaboration in Germany and across Europe

items.name: VehicleSpeedDetection
items.desc: An AI-powered system using YOLOv8 to detect speeding vehicles, recognize license plates, and calculate dynamic fines based on insurance values.
items.result: Achieved 95% accuracy and integrated automated database reporting.

items.name: BulkaDental Management System
items.desc: A comprehensive multi-platform dental clinic management system with treatment planning, role-based dashboards, and discount automation.
items.result: Deployed for real clinical use with modular scalability for web and mobile platforms.

items.name: OpenTicket System
items.desc: A complete ticket management system with admin panel, event CRUD operations, and QR-based e-tickets built with ASP.NET Web Forms.
items.result: Implemented comprehensive event management with QR code generation and ticket validation.

items.name: Multi-Platform Dental App
items.desc: A cross-platform dental application supporting multiple platforms with unified patient management and treatment tracking.
items.result: Created scalable solution supporting web, mobile, and desktop platforms.

items.name: Web Survey Project
items.desc: A comprehensive web-based survey system with data collection, analysis, and reporting capabilities.
items.result: Built responsive survey platform with real-time data collection and analytics.
